parameters.name: AccelerateIpId
parameters.description: The ID of the accelerated IP address that you want to query.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among all requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system uses **RequestId** as **ClientToken**. **RequestId** may be different for each API request.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
